quote: What makes something special is not just what you have to gain, but what you feel there is to lose.
author: Andre Agassi

quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
author: Arnold Palmer

quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: You are never really playing an opponent. You are playing yourself, your own highest standards, and when you reach your limits, that is real joy.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: If you can?t outplay them, outwork them.
author: Ben Hogan

quote: When you're riding, only the race in which you're riding is important.
author: Bill Shoemaker

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: Your biggest opponent isn't the other guy. It's human nature.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: Most talented players don't always succeed. Some don't even make the team. It's more what's inside.
author: Brett Favre

quote: I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability.
author: Bruce Jenner

quote: Stubbornness usually is considered a negative; but I think that trait has been a positive for me.
author: Cal Ripken Jr.

quote: Win If You Can, Lose If You Must, But NEVER QUIT!
author: Cameron Trammell

quote: If you don?t have confidence, you?ll always find a way not to win.
author: Carl Lewis

quote: If you are afraid of failure you don?t deserve to be successful!
author: Charles Barkley

quote: You?ve got to take the initiative and play your game. In a decisive set, confidence is the difference.
author: Chris Evert Lloyd

quote: Gold medals aren?t really made of gold. They?re made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
author: Dan Gable

quote: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up.
author: Dean Karnazes

quote: What to do with a mistake: recognize it, admit it, learn from it, forget it.
author: Dean Smith

quote: There may be people that have more talent than you, but theres no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle, and giving 110 percent all the time.
author: Don Zimmer

quote: Never give up, never give in, and when the upper hand is ours, may we have the ability to handle the win with the dignity that we absorbed the loss.
author: Doug Williams

quote: The hardest skill to acquire in this sport is the one where you compete all out, give it all you have, and you are still getting beat no matter what you do. When you have the killer instinct to fight through that, it is very special.
author: Eddie Reese

quote: Leadership, like coaching, is fighting for the hearts and souls of men and getting them to believe in you.
author: Eddie Robinson

quote: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: The only way to prove that you?re a good sport is to lose.
author: Ernie Banks

quote: It is not the size of a man but the size of his heart that matters.
author: Evander Holyfield

quote: Only he who can see the invisible can do the impossible.
author: Frank L. Gaines

quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
author: George Halas

quote: You find that you have peace of mind and can enjoy yourself, get more sleep, and rest when you know that it was a one hundred percent effort that you gave?win or lose.
author: Gordie Howe

quote: My motto was always to keep swinging. Whether I was in a slump or feeling badly or having trouble off the field, the only thing to do was keep swinging.
author: Hank Aaron

quote: You were born to be a player. You were meant to be here. This moment is yours.
author: Herb Brooks

quote: If you train hard, you'll not only be hard, you'll be hard to beat.
author: Herschel Walker

quote: You can motivate by fear, and you can motivate by reward. But both those methods are only temporary. The only lasting thing is self motivation.
author: Homer Rice

quote: You win some, you lose some, and some get rained out, but you gotta suit up for them all.
author: J. Askenberg

quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.
author: Jack Dempsey

quote: Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind.
author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quote: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding.
author: Jim Valvano

quote: When I go out there, I have no pity on my brother. I am out there to win.
author: Joe Frazier

quote: If you aren't going all the way, why go at all?
author: Joe Namath

quote: The will to win is important, but the will to prepare is vital.
author: Joe Paterno

quote: The road to Easy Street goes through the sewer.
author: John Madden

quote: Do not let what you can not do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: The five S?s of sports training are: stamina, speed, strength, skill, and spirit; but the greatest of these is spirit.
author: Ken Doherty

quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than 50 preaching it.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: Make sure your worst enemy doesn't live between your own two ears.
author: Laird Hamilton

quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: Push yourself again and again. Don't give an inch until the final buzzer sounds.
author: Larry Bird

quote: You have to do something in your life that is honorable and not cowardly if you are to live in peace with yourself.
author: Larry Brown

quote: Show me a guy who's afraid to look bad, and I'll show you a guy you can beat every time.
author: Lou Brock

quote: How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: If you have everything under control, you're not moving fast enough.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: If you fail to prepare, you're prepared to fail.
author: Mark Spitz

quote: A trophy carries dust. Memories last forever.
author: Mary Lou Retton

quote: Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.
author: Matt Biondi

quote: Somewhere behind the athlete you've become and the hours of practice and the coaches who have pushed you is a little girl who fell in love with the game and never looked back... play for her.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Obstacles don?t have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don?t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: You can?t put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: During my 18 years I came to bat almost 10,000 times. I struck out about 1,700 times and walked maybe 1,800 times. You figure a ballplayer will average about 500 at bats a season. That means I played seven years without ever hitting the ball.
author: Mickey Mantle

quote: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.
author: Mike Singletary

quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, "Don?t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion."
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It isn?t the mountains ahead to climb that wear you out; it?s the pebble in your shoe.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
author: Pat Riley

quote: There are only two options regarding commitment. You're either IN or you're OUT. There is no such thing as life in-between.
author: Pat Riley

quote: Number one is just to gain a passion for running. To love the morning, to love the trail, to love the pace on the track. And if some kid gets really good at it, that?s cool too.
author: Pat Tyson

quote: It?s not the will to win that matters?everyone has that. It?s the will to prepare to win that matters.
author: Paul "Bear" Bryant

quote: When you win, say nothing, when you lose, say less.
author: Paul Brown

quote: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
author: Pele

quote: I never left the field saying I could have done more to get ready and that gives me piece of mind.
author: Peyton Manning

quote: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.
author: Phil Jackson

quote: To uncover your true potential you must first find your own limits and then you have to have the courage to blow past them.
author: Picabo Street

quote: People ask me what I do in winter when there's no baseball. I'll tell you what I do. I stare out the window and wait for spring.
author: Rogers Hornsby

quote: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
author: Ronnie Lott

quote: I became a good pitcher when I stopped trying to make them miss the ball and started trying to make them hit it.
author: Sandy Koufax

quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: I never worry about the problem. I worry about the solution.
author: Shaquille O?Neal

quote: To give any less than your best is to sacrifice a gift.
author: Steve Prefontaine

quote: The principle is competing against yourself. It's about self-improvement, about being better than you were the day before.
author: Steve Young

quote: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
author: Ted Williams

quote: Just keep going. Everybody gets better if they keep at it.
author: Ted Williams

quote: When you?ve got something to prove, there?s nothing greater than a challenge.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: I didn't believe in team motivation. I believe in getting a team prepared so it knows it will have the necessary confidence when it steps on the field and be prepared to play a good game.
author: Tom Landry

quote: I've learned that something constructive comes from every defeat.
author: Tom Landry

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: Some people say I have attitude, maybe I do... but I think you have to. You have to believe in yourself when no one else does that makes you a winner right there.
author: Venus Williams

quote: It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Winning is not a sometime thing, it is an all the time thing. You don?t do things right once in a while. You do them right all the time.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The highest compliment that you can pay me is to say that I work hard every day, that I never dog it.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: It ain't over till it's over.
author: Yogi Berra
